DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Alendronate Sodium /Vitamin D3 Combination Tablets ( FOSAMAX PLUS ) Versus Calcitriol Treatment Osteoporosis Postmenopausal Women China ( MK-0217A-264 )
DOC.detailed_description: This 6-month , randomize , open-label , active-comparator control , parallel-group study 6-month extension evaluate safety efficacy alendronate sodium 70 mg plus vitamin D3 5600 IU combination tablet versus calcitriol treatment osteoporosis postmenopausal woman China . Participants randomly assign receive alendronate 70 mg plus vitamin D3 5600 IU combination tablet weekly orally calcitriol 0.25 μg daily orally .
